title: I have a problem with the free Dreadknight Garen skin
body: I have a problem with the free Dreadknight Garen skin

replies.body: No worries!  I went ahead and added this for you.  ^^

Plz im eu west and i have followed and everything but i cant get the free garen skin, i got the tristana and allistar but not the garen even if i followed leauge of legends twitter. Could u plz add that skin for me as well<3
I cant redeem mine either, send help.
